name: Crazy Canteen: Cafeteria edition
description:
Crazy Canteen is a roll and write games based in draft &pattern building mechanics. In this game, players takes the role of the manager of the canteen inside the offices of Vaporware Inc who takes care of giving lunch service to the employees of the company.
So, the objective of each player is to get as much points of satisfaction as possible sitting the guest in the canteen map according to their preferences. Employees are divided in 8 categories and there are interactions between them that affect how satisfied they are. Player need to be careful about how they sit employees in the tables.
Points can be also obtained with a proper management of desserts, by using delivery service in the office or asking for feedback to employees.

SUMMARY

- From 1 to 99 players
- It takes 30 minutes to play.

- Age: 8+

OBJECTIVE

The objective of the game is to be the player with the highest score.
Each player will get or lose points based on:
1. How are employees sited in the tables at the canteen map.
2. The final stock of each type of dessert.
3. The number of empty chairs in the canteen at the end of the game.

COMPONENTS

One sheet per player to play.
2 D6 dices, 1 pencil (per player), game sheet
